ValidationRule.description: List of fields needed for activation
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( TODAY() < ADDMONTHS(Birthdate__c, 14), VaccineDueDistemper__c > TODAY(), VaccineDueHepatitis__c > TODAY(), VaccineDueParainfluenza__c > TODAY(), VaccineDueParvovirus__c > TODAY(), VaccineDueRabies__c > TODAY(), PhysicalExamDue__c > TODAY() ), AND(NOT(ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status__c), 'Active')), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Active')))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: For Activation of the Dog, It needs to be at least 14 months, Vaccinations need to be current
